pages.title: Scalloped Hammerhead
pages.text: The scalloped hammerhead ($(o)Sphyrna lewini$()) is a species of hammerhead shark in the family Sphyrnidae.$(br2)It was originally known as Zygaena lewini.$(br2)The Greek word sphyrna translates into "hammer" in English, referring to the shape of this shark's head, which is its most distinguishing characteristic.

pages.title: Scalloped Hammerhead
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
